root.title: Azure Active Directory Hybrid Health AD FS Service Delete
root.description: This detection uses azureactivity logs (Administrative category) to identify the deletion of an Azure AD Hybrid health AD FS service instance in a tenant. A threat actor can create a new AD Health ADFS service and create a fake server to spoof AD FS signing logs. The health AD FS service can then be deleted after it is not longer needed via HTTP requests to Azure.
root.author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research), MSTIC

falsepositives.item: Legitimate AAD Health AD FS service instances being deleted in a tenant
